name: Shop Or Rot
description:
Use your wits and skills to survive the night against the on-coming hordes of undead! All you have is yourself, a couple of strangers and a near empty mall to survive the night. 

This game has been made as a finals assignment in the Game Development MA/MFA program at Academy of Arts University.

Credits:

Original Concept: Adrian Ihle

UI and 2D Art: Hang Li

System Design: Chris Armienti & Tharadol 'Bay' Panburana

Combat Design: Tharadol 'Bay' Panburana

Level Design: Adrian Ihle

Project Management: Adrian Ihle

VFX:   Asset packs by Kakky from the Unreal Marketplace
